Course Description: Phar540C aims to introduce the pharmacology principles and the therapeutic uses of selected drug classes. This course is divided into 4 modules, each worth 1 credit. For each module, introductory lectures are given in selected topics and students will engaged in self-directed learning of assigned topics. Phar592B is a pre-requisite course for Phar540C. Registration requires consent from the course coordinator.
Offered with a minimal enrolment of 4 students
courseName: Topics in Pharmacology - TOPICS IN PHARM
description: Lectures and supervised studies in selected areas of pharmacology. Enrolment restricted.
